Class DrawableBTree<E>

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  DrawableBTree<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DrawableBTree<E>
extends javax.swing.JPanel

DrawableBTree class is a class created specifically for CSC115 Lab students to visualize an existing BinaryTree structure. The tree can be visualized in a Frame or applet that creates the DrawableBTree, then shows it. To be shown on its own, it needs to be created, and then "showFrame()" called. This will give the drawing its own frame which can then be re-sized and the BinaryTree should stretch or shrink to fit the window. Last update: 2010-03-21 This file is open source and may be used as learning tool and can be shared, but should not be claimed as original work by anyone using this file. Modifications are encouraged, but should include credit to the original author.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

NODE_START_SIZE

public static final int NODE_START_SIZE
The approximate diameter, in pixels, of the initial node sizes. Used when the tree has its own frame.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EDGE_START_SIZE

public static final int EDGE_START_SIZE
The approximate length, in pixels, of the initial edge sizes. Used when the tree has its own frame.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

DrawableBTree

public DrawableBTree(java.awt.Dimension canvasSize)
Does nothing really, except create an empty JPanel with a preferred size. Useful only in setting up an empty panel for another GUI application.

DrawableBTree

public DrawableBTree(BinaryTree<E> tree,
                     java.awt.Dimension canvasSize)
Generates a Drawn BinaryTree object in a JPanel. The BinaryTree must have the following method(s):
  • a getRoot method that returns the generic TreeNode that is the root of the BinaryTree to be drawn.

Parameters:
tree - The BinaryTree object that is to be drawn.
canvasSize - The size of the canvas that will show the panel.

DrawableBTree

public DrawableBTree(BinaryTree<E> tree)
Generates a Drawn BinaryTree in a JPanel. The BinaryTree must have the following method(s):
  • a getRoot method that returns the generic TreeNode that is the root of the BinaryTree to be drawn.
The panel size is determined by the number of nodes in the tree and the height, which is calculated in this class.

Parameters:
tree - The BinaryTree object that is to be drawn.
